results.title: Treatment With Metformin Improves Erectile Dysfunction in a Murine Model of Obesity Associated With Insulin Resistance.
results.text_hl: Likewise, the impaired electrical field stimulation-induced @<m>DISEASE_Agenesis_of_Corpus_Callosum</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D061085 @@@CC@@@ relaxations in @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were also partly restored by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
